channel.title: Eurovision on Luca Rossi
channel.description: Recent content in Eurovision on Luca Rossi

item.title: Country Music: Strategic Incentives of Competing Voters
item.description: This article analyzes the strategic robustness of positional voting systems using Eurovision Song Contest data. Our findings reveal strategic voting behaviors, particularly among jury members, influenced by information from the semifinal stage rather than the quality of the songs.
